summary: Completed comprehensive testing of OR Scheduling Platform with Google OAuth integration. All 28 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend testing confirmed login flow, dashboard, Settings page with Google Integration tab, Residents/Attendings management all working correctly.

issues: Minor: Missing aria-describedby for DialogContent (accessibility warning in console)

google_oauth_status.auth_url_generation: WORKING - Generates valid Google OAuth URL with correct client_id, redirect_uri, and scopes
google_oauth_status.redirect_uri_mismatch: CONFIGURATION ISSUE - Google Cloud Console needs redirect URI 'https://orchedule.preview.emergentagent.com/api/google/callback' added to authorized redirect URIs. This is NOT a code bug.

action_items: GOOGLE CLOUD CONSOLE CONFIG: Add 'https://orchedule.preview.emergentagent.com/api/google/callback' to authorized redirect URIs in Google Cloud Console for the OAuth client
critical_code_review_comments: Settings.jsx line 28: Typo in state variable name 'setAtttendings' should be 'setAttendings' (3 t's instead of 2) - inherited from previous iteration
DialogContent components missing aria-describedby for accessibility - minor issue

test_users_created: Multiple test users created during pytest execution with pattern: *_test_<timestamp>@example.com

seed_data_creation: Multiple test patients, residents, attendings, schedules, and tasks created during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features working. Google OAuth endpoints are correctly implemented - the redirect_uri_mismatch error is a Google Cloud Console configuration issue, not a code bug. The redirect URI needs to be added to the OAuth client's authorized redirect URIs in Google Cloud Console.

features_tested.google_auth_url_generation: PASS - Generates valid OAuth URL with correct parameters
features_tested.patient_crud: PASS - Create, Read, Update, Delete all working
features_tested.resident_management: PASS - Create, Read, Update, Delete all working
features_tested.task_management: PASS - Create, Read, Toggle all working
features_tested.frontend_google_integration_tab: PASS - Shows Connect Google button, status, feature cards

mocked_apis.CPT_codes: CPT code lookup uses static JSON file /app/backend/cpt_codes.json instead of PDF extraction
